name: I Like The Hair
description:
Made for Wizard Jam X. Take control of Rapunzel. You have long been trapped in your tower by magical means, your prince long since dead and you abandoned. A confluence of magic, your now absurdly long hair, and your breaking spirit; a power awakens within. This is a story of revenge.

Controls: 

Mouse - Left click to pull the tower. Right click to push the tower.

In case of unforeseen bugs - press R to reset to the most recent checkpoint

Alt+F4 to quit.
